title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 380-7.8 - Proof of coverage
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 380-7.8 - Proof of coverage

State Regulations
(a) The State Insurance Fund and private carriers shall provide proof of paid
family leave coverage to the board for all covered employers in the format
prescribed by the chair. (b) Board
employees investigating compliance with PFL shall be provided with all
requested information by the employer upon request. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
380-7.8

Adopted

New

York State Register July 19, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 29, eff. 7/19/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
